statements: UPDATE WearableDeviceData SET heart_rate = 75, temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 14:30:00';

UPDATE sensor_data SET sensor_value = 25.5 WHERE patient_id = 1 AND sensor_id = 2 AND data_time = '2022-10-15 12:30:00';

UPDATE wearable_devices SET device_type='Fitbit' WHERE device_id=101;
